name: Island Mini Golf
description:
This game started as an idea from my last used 5 emojis

I've always wanted to make a golf game and when I saw the apples.I knew I needed to make a golf game that instead of a regular golf ball you play as fruits.

this time instead of trying to make tons of levels. I focused on only one level and polish it as much as I could under 48 hours

the game has been updated and has + 2 new levels

‏‏‎

Credits

a game by Cem Kaan Uğur

made in 48 hours
